page.title: 17School Days - Tamar Valley
page.content: On Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays and Fridays we commence school with individual assemblies for the Juniors and the Infants. We have 15 minute playtimes at 10.40 and 2.15, dinner time is from 12.00 until 1.15 and we finish school at 3.30. On Monday mornings we go swimming at Launceston Leisure Centre which is about 16 miles away. We have games on Tuesdays, craft on Thursdays and Art on Fridays. We do Maths and English every day. Our Enviomential Studies include Local History and Geography and we visit the seaside, the moors, historic houses, factories and so on. We have Sports and Games and take part in local competitions with other Schools.
